definition: two trees that grow together as one/fig. conjugal union
surname Lian
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
Dalian University of Technology
pinyin: Da4 lian2 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2

definition: to tie the knot (idiom)/to get married
In the sky to be two birds flying wing to wing, on earth to be two trees with branches intertwined/wishing for conjugal bliss
pinyin: zai4 tian1 yuan4 zuo4 bi3 yi4 niao3 , zai4 di4 yuan4 zuo4 lian2 li3 zhi1
containing_words.word: 在天願做比翼鳥，在地願做連理枝

sentences.english: The two trees have grown together to form a double trunk.
sentences.chinese: 這兩棵樹已長合在一起形成了一棵連理樹。

sentences.english: His first wife spent twenty years enduring and forgiving his infidelities .
sentences.chinese: 連理廿載，他的髮妻都用來隱忍，原諒他的不忠了。

sentences.english: That we wish, to be the inseparable birds flying in the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 在天願作比翼鳥，在地願爲連理枝。

sentences.english: The knot, to wish happiness with.
sentences.chinese: 喜結連理日，恭祝幸福隨。

sentences.english: He was deaf to my supplications.
Do you think they are really happy to get married or is it supposed to be a speculation?
sentences.chinese: 認爲他們是喜結連理，或是有意的“炒作”？

sentences.english: This life, who broke with reasonable sticks?
sentences.chinese: 此生，是誰折斷了連理的枝？

sentences.english: With the war over Tyrande and Malfurion reached an understanding.
sentences.chinese: 戰役結束後，瑪法里奧和泰蘭德達結成了連理。

to throw/to cast
